LanguageData.NotEnoughSilverForBill: You did not have enough silver to pay an outstanding bill from
LanguageData.ConfiscatedTithes: They have confiscated your tithes in return
LanguageData.Name: Name
LanguageData.NotEnoughSilverOnMapToPayBill: You do not have enough silver on the current map to pay the bill
LanguageData.CaravanOnWay: A caravan is already on its way
LanguageData.CaravanSentToLocation: A caravan has been sent to the location! They will arrive in
LanguageData.NotEnoughSilverToSettle: You do not have enough silver on the current map to settle a new colony
LanguageData.InvalidFaction: That faction can't run an empire on its own!
LanguageData.ButtonNotAvailable: This button is not available yet
LanguageData.PolicyAlreadyEnacted: That policy has already been enacted
LanguageData.NotEnoughMoneyToEnact: You do not have enough silver on the current map to enact that policy
LanguageData.AlreadyPolicyTypeBeingEnacted: There is already a policy of that type being enacted
LanguageData.AlreadyPolicyInSlot: There is already a policy being enacted in that slot
LanguageData.CouldNotFindMapOfCapital: Could not find map of capital
LanguageData.ResearchGeneratedWaste: Research points generated by your faction has been wasted as you have no research selected
LanguageData.EnactedInYourFaction: has been enacted in your faction
LanguageData.SelectTile: Select a tile to create the colony
LanguageData.SetAsFactionCapital: {0} has been set as the faction capital
LanguageData.NoFactionForMilitary: You cannot make a military without a faction!
LanguageData.FactionHappinessDesc: The measure of the faction's overall happiness. A high happiness means that any internal conflict within the settlement will lean heavily to your favor.
LanguageData.FactionLoyaltyDesc: The measure of the faction's overall loyalty. The loyalty of a settlement determines how willing the settlement is to listen to you. A high loyalty will reduce the chance of defection.
LanguageData.FactionUnrestDesc: The measure of the faction's overall unrest. The higher unrest grows, the more likely dangerous events internal in your faction will spark. Let it grow too high, and a faction-wide revolt may grow.
LanguageData.FactionProsperityDesc: The measure of the faction's overall prosperity. The prosperity of a town directly correlates with the production of resources. 50% prosperity = 50% production. If prosperity is damaged, it will slowly accumulate over time.
LanguageData.TotalFactionProduction: The total faction-wide production of the resource
LanguageData.BuildingAlreadyType: There is already a building of that type
LanguageData.NotEnoughSilverConstructBuilding: You do not have enough silver on the current map to construct that building
LanguageData.BuildingBeingBuiltAlreadyType: There is already a building of that type being built
LanguageData.BuildingAlreadyConstructed: There is already a building being constructed there
LanguageData.ErrorEndingAttackDescription: There was a problem ending the attack. Most likely, the map didn't delete correctly. Please report this if you don't get your colonists sent to defend back, or your military never comes off cooldown.
LanguageData.UpgradeColonyDesc: Upgrading this colony will increase the max worker count before the cost of workers begins to rise by 3 workers. The military level of this colony will also increase by 1.
LanguageData.NotEnoughSilverUpgrade: The current map does not have enough silver to pay for the settlement upgrade.
LanguageData.CannotBeUpgradedPastMax: This settlement cannot be upgraded past max level
LanguageData.SettlementProductionOf: The total settlement production of the resource
LanguageData.SettlementMilitaryLevelDesc: The measure of the settlements's military level. The military level of a town directly affects the town's ability to defend itself as well as attack external threats
LanguageData.SettlementHappinessDesc: The measure of the Settlement's overall happiness. A high happiness means that any internal conflict within the settlement will lean heavily to your favor.
LanguageData.SettlementLoyaltyDesc: The measure of the Settlement's overall loyalty. The loyalty of a settlement determines how willing the settlement is to listen to you. A high loyalty will reduce the chance of defection.
LanguageData.SettlementUnrestDesc: The measure of the Settlement's overall unrest. The higher unrest grows, the more likely dangerous events internal in your Settlement will spark. Let it grow too high, and a Settlement-wide revolt may grow.
LanguageData.SettlementProsperityDesc: The measure of the Settlement's overall prosperity. The prosperity of a town directly correlates with the production of resources. 50% prosperity = 50% production. If prosperity is damaged, it will slowly accumulate over time.
LanguageData.AddedInFuture: This will be added to in the future
LanguageData.ReasonDeployed: A squad containing it is deployed
LanguageData.ReasonDefending: A squad containing it is defending a settlement
LanguageData.moveSuccess: {0} are moving to the position and standing by.
LanguageData.leaveSuccess: {0} are now leaving the map. {1} dead.
LanguageData.cantSendWithDangerLevel: You can't send a prisoner to your settlements when the map has a danger level of {0}!
LanguageData.selectedPosOutOfBounds: The position you selected is out of bounds for this map!
LanguageData.selectedPosTooCloseToEdge: The position you selected is to close to the map edge!
LanguageData.deploymentSuccessDesc: The military forces of {0} have been deployed to {1}
LanguageData.transportingInjuredShuttle: A shuttle is transporting injured colonists back to you after a successful settlement defence
LanguageData.transportingInjuredDropPod: Drop pods are transporting injured colonists back to you after a successful settlement defence
LanguageData.transportingInjuredCaravan: A caravan is transporting injured colonists back to you after a successful settlement defence
LanguageData.shuttleLandingBlockedWithItems: A shuttle couldn't find a free landing spot and is waiting for one to be cleared. It contains: {0}.
LanguageData.shuttleLandingBlocked: A shuttle couldn't find a free landing spot and is waiting for one to be cleared.
LanguageData.caravanDangerTooHigh: A caravan is waiting with it's delivery until your map is clear of danger.
LanguageData.caravanDangerTooHighWithItems: A caravan is waiting with it's delivery until your map is clear of danger. They carry: {0}.
LanguageData.taxDeliveryModeDefaultDesc: None. Delivery depends on technology and settlement buildings
LanguageData.taxDeliveryModeTaxSpotDesc: TaxSpot. Delivery spawns on the tax spot
LanguageData.taxDeliveryModeCaravanDesc: Caravan. Delivery is always brought by a caravan
LanguageData.taxDeliveryModeDropPodDesc: DropPod. Delivery is always arrives in drop pods
LanguageData.taxDeliveryModeShuttleDesc: Shuttle. Delivery always arrives by shuttle
LanguageData.taxDeliveryModeShuttleUnavailableDesc: Shuttle. Unavailable due to royality not being present
LanguageData.deliveryPawnsEngageEnemy: The delivering pawns are engaging an enemy!
LanguageData.pawnsLeavingMap: The delivering pawns are leaving the map.
LanguageData.pawnsLeavingMapNoPath: The delivering pawns are leaving the map, because they couldn't access the tax delivery spot.
LanguageData.pawnsLeavingMapWithDowned: The delivering pawns are collecting downed members and leaving the map.
LanguageData.settlementDeliveringLoot: Your settlement is delivering the following loot to you:
LanguageData.deliveryHeldUpArriving: A delivery that was forced to wait has arrived!
LanguageData.shuttlePortCallShuttleDesc: Ask your settlement to send you a shuttle that can transport a caravan:\n {0} uses remaining (Costs {1})
LanguageData.targetAnythingWithColonists: Target anything with free colonists to send the shuttle
LanguageData.requestShuttleToCaravan: Request a shuttle for this caravan
LanguageData.requestShuttleToColony: Request a shuttle for this colony
LanguageData.requestShuttleToMap: Request a shuttle for this map
LanguageData.shuttlePortCallShuttleForCaravanLabel: Request a shuttle for a caravan
LanguageData.targetAnyWorldObject: Target any world object you want to send the shuttle to:\n {0} uses remaining (Costs {1})
LanguageData.noShuttleUsesRemaining: No shuttle uses remaining in this tax period!
LanguageData.notEnoughShuttleUsesRemaining: Not enough shuttle uses remaining in this tax period!
LanguageData.autoDefendWarning: Keep in mind that this setting is not the same as the automatic battle resolve setting found in the settings menu!
LanguageData.autoBattleEnabledNoManualFight: You can't manually fight battles if automatic battle resolve is enabled!
